general.roles: Carry, Nuker, Pusher, Initiator, Durable, Disabler

facet_1.name: Crash Landing
facet_1.effects: Tossed units slow and deal bonus damage to other targets at the Toss landing location in a larger radius. +125 Effect Radius, Ã—1.2 Landing Damage Factor

facet_2.name: Insurmountable
facet_2.effects: Grants bonus status resistance and bonus slow resistance per current strength

effects: Tiny channels to throw random trees within the radius towards the area-targeted location
Deals damage correspondingly to Tiny's attack damage upon per tree impact while applying various attack effects
Attacks on buildings are more effective when Tiny is wielding a tree
Increases the damage of the thrown tree projectile
Removes the number of attacks limit for Tree Grab - all Tree Grab effects are permanent on Tiny until he throws the tree out

level_20: +60 Tree Grab Unit Attack Damage Bonus

abilities.name: Craggy Exterior
abilities.description: Applies an attack damage reduction debuff stack per attack taken to enemy units attacking Tiny
abilities.details: This ability levels up with Grow

abilities.name: Insurmountable
abilities.description: Grants bonus status resistance and bonus slow resistance per current strength
abilities.details: Selecting the Insurmountable facet unlocks this ability

ability_1.name: Avalanche
ability_1.details: Bombards an area with rocks, continuously doing small intervals of stun and damage to enemy units within the effect radius
ability_1.description: Inanimate rock becomes animate when called by the Stone Giant

ability_2.name: Toss
ability_2.details: Grabs the nearest unit, regardless of its faction, within the radius around Tiny. The launched unit becomes a projectile, and homes into the targeted unit, dealing damage within the landing radius upon impact
ability_2.description: Tiny's gargantuan stature allows him to catapult even the sturdiest of warriors

ability_3.name: Tree Grab
ability_3.details: Wields a tree as a weapon for a limited number of attacks. Grants Tiny bonus attack range, and a psuedo-cleave attack effect until the tree is thrown
ability_3.description: Sticks and stones break all the bones, with structures sure to follow

ability_4.name: Tree Volley
ability_4.details: Tiny channels to throw random trees within the radius towards the area-targeted location. Deals damage correspondingly to Tiny's attack damage upon per tree impact while applying various attack effects
ability_4.description: Sticks thrown from stones are like to shatter many bones

ability_5.name: Grow
ability_5.details: Gains craggy mass, increasing his attack damage, and armor while slowing his total attack speed
ability_5.description: Watching a hill become a mountain is awe-inspiring - especially if the mountain begins laying waste to adversaries
